title: Power Plate Graphite Exercise Machine - MY7 Features
description:
Buy MY7 now - http://www.abt.com/product/75414/Power-Plate-MY7.html
Shop home gyms - http://www.abt.com/category/2012/Home-Gyms.html

Benefits:
• Increased muscle strength and power
• Increased metabolism
• Reduction of cellulite
• More beautiful and tighter skin
• Faster anabolic recovery and reduction of stress hormone
• Improved core conditioning and stability
• Natural elevation of Human Growth Hormone
• Increased flexibility and muscle relaxation
• Pain dampening
• Increased blood circulation
• Stimulation of bone growth and increased bone strength
• Improved drainage of the lymphatic system
• Minimal stress to tendons and joints
• Avoidance of injuries and improved recovery

Whats Included:
• Instructions for Use
• Power Cord
• Hand Straps (set 2)
• Rubber Mat
• Dust Covers (column and platform)
• proMOTION Handles
Features:
• Grade: Designed for home use
• Color: Graphite
• Power Supply: 100 - 240VAC 50 / 60Hz; Universal Voltage
• Frequency Adjust: 1Hz increments
• Maximum Load: 300lb / 136kg
• User-friendly interactive display
• Time: 0-9 minutes in 15 sec increments
• Vibration: Tri-planar mostly vertical up to 40 times per second
• Vertical Displacement: High / Low settings
• PrecisionWave™ Technology
• DualSync™ Twin Motors

Safe And Easy:
• The Power-Plate is effective
Leading scientific research has shown that even after a short period of time both power and flexibility increases and metabolism and circulation are greatly improved
• The Power-Plate is safe
Many millions of acceleration minutes have already been safely "absorbed" on a world-wide scale without incident. Numerous research institutes have found Power-Plate a highly effective modality of training without negative side effects
• The Power-Plate is easy
The exercises are simple and can be done by anyone without using heavy weights. Actual training time is short and effective
• The Power-Plate is user friendly
The equipment doesn't take up a great deal of space and hardly needs any maintenance. Operation is simple
• Power-Plate International
Power Plate International is the market leader in the Acceleration Training field and is continuously developing this innovative training method. Stimulating and initiating scientific research is seen as a very important factor in this development. The Power-Plate may be found in sports training centers physiotherapy offices hospitals rehabilitation centers and beauty centers. Many high-profile athletes and celebrities have elected to train with the Power-Plate
• Power-Plate
The combination of work family life and social activities can sometimes make regular trips to the gym hard to schedule. And of course not everyone feels completely at ease in such surroundings. Thankfully this is now a thing of the past due to the development of the Power-Plate my5 for use in the comfort of your own home. This state-of-the-art machine allows you to train whenever it suits your needs
How It Works:
• A platform generates vibration which is then transferred to the body and the muscles causing them to contract in a reflex. This also stimulates circulation tremendously. Tendons are stretched and even deep-lying muscles such as the pelvic floor muscles the muscles around the spinal column and in the face are reinforced by this reflex activation. Without using additional weights and without having to put any additional strain on the body the team of Power-Plate experts have developed several training schedules enabling everyone to improve their looks health and general well-being. Anyone can use the Power-Plate whether top athletes untrained elderly or overweight
